name: dayz-server-manager
description: A server installer and watch-dog for dayz with built-in Discord and RCon bot

scripts.postinstall: npm run installSqlite && npm run installUi
scripts.installSqlite: cd node_modules/better-sqlite3 && npx prebuild-install -d -r node -t v14.0.0 --arch x64 --platform win32
scripts.pack: del-cli build/*.exe && cp VERSION dist/VERSION && pkg --out-path build .
scripts.buildUi: del-cli dist/ui && cd ui && npm run build
scripts.buildUi:debug: del-cli dist/ui && cd ui && npm run build:debug
scripts.buildUiIfAbsent: node scripts/exists.js dist/ui || npm run buildUi
scripts.build: del-cli dist/* !dist/ui && tsc && npm run generators && npm run buildUiIfAbsent && npm run buildPbos
scripts.build:debug: del-cli dist/* !dist/ui && tsc && npm run generators && npm run buildUi:debug && npm run buildPbos
scripts.buildWindows: del-cli dist/* !dist/ui && tsc && npm run generators && npm run buildUiIfAbsent && npm run buildPbosWindows
scripts.buildWindows:debug: del-cli dist/* !dist/ui && tsc && npm run generators && npm run buildUi:debug && npm run buildPbosWindows
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run mkdirExec && cd exec && node ../dist/index.js
scripts.startWindows: npm run buildWindows && npm run mkdirExec && cd exec && node ../dist/index.js
scripts.startWindows:debug: npm run buildWindows:debug && npm run mkdirExec && cd exec && node --inspect ../dist/index.js
scripts.buildAndPack: npm run build:debug && npm run pack
scripts.buildAndPack:debug: npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.startPacked: npm run buildAndPack && npm run runPacked
scripts.runPacked: npm run mkdirExec && cd exec && bash -c './../build/dayz-server-manager.exe'
scripts.buildPbos: npm run buildMainPbo && npm run buildExpPbo
scripts.buildMainPboWindows: node scripts/mkdir.js dist/mods/@DayZServerManager/addons && @powershell Start-Process -FilePath 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Mikero\DePboTools\bin\MakePbo.exe' -ArgumentList '-P -@=DayZServerManager/Scripts watcher_mod/DayZServerManager/Scripts dist/mods/@DayZServerManager/addons/Scripts.pbo'
scripts.buildPbosWindows: npm run buildExpPboWindows && npm run buildMainPboWindows
